entry.string: oc process -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sogis/pipelines/master/api_webgisclient/api-gateway/deploymentconfig.yaml -p NAMESPACE=gdi-integration -p TAG=2.0.25 -p REPLICAS=1 -p CPU_REQUEST=50m -p CPU_LIMIT=500m -p MEMORY_REQUEST=80Mi -p MEMORY_LIMIT=150Mi -p ENVIRONMENT=-int -p LOADBALANCE=false -p SSL=false | oc apply -n gdi-integration -f- oc rollout latest -n gdi-integration api-gateway oc rollout status -n gdi-integration dc api-gateway
